3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Emma Morris - Agt: 510-508-5115 - An elegant Craftsman-style shingle home in amenity-rich Dimond District!  The inviting street presence welcomes you with a wide front porch. From here, swing open the entry door to a gracious, large living room that has windows on three side and is centered on a fireplace surrounded by an inglenook--perfect seating to cozy up with a good book. A formal dining room fits a sizable table and its bay window has built-in seating. The updated eat-in kitchen is open and cheerful with tile countertops and stainless-steel appliances; the action centers around a butcher block island surrounded by cabinets with plentiful storage. An adjacent nook is perfect for office space. Two bedrooms are nicely separated by a full bathroom. Arched ceilings and doorways, various window seats and built-ins, hardwood floors, and classic architectural details of the era give this home much character. Great outdoor living with a large deck, which opens directly from the kitchen with a wide-open vista, is perfect for lounging, dining, and enjoying afternoon light. A lower garden level provides more entertaining space—room for games, fire pit, or hot tub? Close to Farmer Joe’s, La Farine, Grand Lake Kitchen, Hive, Dimond Slice Pizza and Bombera, as well as local and SF Express bus stops. Open Sat & Sun 2-4pm
Confidential Remarks: Open Sat and Sun 01/28 & 01/29, 2-4pm. Offers, if any, requested 02/01 by 11am. Large attic storage with full lighting--for viewing, call Emma. No Alarm. Disclosure link: https://app.disclosures.io/link/3449-Laguna-Avenue-nufppw2k

Remarks: Christian Downer - 510-599-2000 - This impressive 1924 Prairie style home is sited on a prominent corner lot in the upper Dimond district.  The property offers a bright, two-story floor plan that includes three bedrooms, two updated baths, a modern eat-in kitchen, a detached office studio and a finished garage for versatile use.  Attractive architectural details, dual-pane windows, expansive outlooks and artfully landscaped grounds complement a myriad of modern upgrades throughout.  The spacious entry foyer opens to formal living and dining rooms with pristine hardwood floors, anchored by a handsome fireplace.  A contemporary eat-in kitchen with quartz countertops, new LG stainless appliances and an adjoining laundry room leads to a generous outdoor deck overlooking the thoughtfully landscaped yard and drought-tolerant gardens.  Minutes to popular dining, convenient shopping and transportation!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Mireille Hall - 510-219-4304 -  Welcome to this versatile Duplex located in the heart of both the Laurel & Dimond District. Set just above the street offering privacy, this property is unique with 2 spacious units. One featuring a lovely private yard/patio and the other a bonus room and/or den . Each unit has its own washer and dryer with separate entrances and separate meters for all utilities. It truly lives like a single family home with the side-by-side duplex design. There are mounds of potential with this sleek chic mid century multiple unit gem. The detached oversized 3 car garage with parking spaces in front of each one offers both off street parking and/or storage. This is a perfect owner occupied duplex where you can rent out one and live in the other! It is also a fabulous portfolio property with potential for expansion or adding your personal touch with updates. Per the seller city zoning reflects RM3 possibilities and/or potential for future ADU, buyer to verify all! Come take a look at open house, we look forward to seeing you there! Don't forget to check with your lender for the FHA multi unit loan program! Endless possibilities and a great as-is duplex!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Regina Jacobs - 510-693-7973 - New listing. Exceptional Lincoln Heights Bungalow abounds with refined architectural details. Eye-catching decorative trim around the doorways and the box beam ceiling in the dining room blend seamlessly with modern touches. The spacious living room is light and airy thanks to an abundance of windows. A sitting room adjoined to the living room provides additional space to relax. The formal dining room is perfect for entertaining and welcomes celebration dinners as easily as everyday meals. A smartly designed chef’s kitchen provides plenty of room for the chef to create while entertaining family and friends. The cozy breakfast nook flows out to a sunny deck and urban oasis. Two generous bedrooms share a large bathroom. The backyard is simply stunning. A level lawn area is surrounded by fruit trees and vegetable boxes. A patio offers a romantic spot to enjoy a summer dinner. A detached garage completes this jewel box. The coveted Lincoln Heights location is a great mix of quiet comfort and urban amenities. Easy to restaurants, shops, parks and transportation. Open Sunday 2-4pm.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Greg R Novak - 510-472-4770 - Discover this move-in ready retreat! A charming single-level, two-bed 1920’s California Craftsman home with a roomy detached structure, cedar hot tub, and more! Located on a manicured block of Texas Street, the property includes a serene garden adorned with many, low-maintenance native succulents and sages. Open the front door and you’re greeted with gorgeous original hardwood floors. The spacious living room and dining room are complete with a wood-burning fireplace and stylish LED and Serena & Lily lighting. These oak floors continue through the updated eat-in kitchen, which features recessed lighting, sleek counters, stainless appliances, and a convenient pass-through to the laundry room. The rear bedroom offers French doors that open out to a covered deck overlooking the courtyard. Your retreat continues outside with flagstone pathways, a mature orange tree, and more native plants surrounding the outdoor shower and hot tub. Located at the back of the property is a versatile structure housing two additional rooms, a bathroom with a stall shower, a loft space, a utility closet and ample storage areas. You’re close to amazing restaurants (Bombera!) and shopping (Farmer Joe’s) making this a perfect home for those seeking a tranquil retreat. See it for yourself!
Confidential Remarks: Thank you for everyone who sowed this beautiful home

Remarks: Maria Cavallo-Merrion - 510-919-8841 - Welcome to an exceptional retreat nestled in a serene park-like setting, where a brick pathway and vibrant gardens shaded by a majestic sycamore tree greet you. This stunning wood shingled home boasts 9 dormers with custom windows and an oversized porch that invites you inside. The main level features a living room with wood floors, wood molding and details, and windows framing garden views. The eat-in kitchen delights with butcher block counters, high-end appliances, and a vintage O'Keefe & Merritt range—blending elegance and modern functionality. A sunny bedroom and bath completes the space. Offering a flexible floor plan, upstairs find another bedroom, bath and oversized airy living space with wet-bar which opens to the deck and gardens. The cathedral-like loft offers an additional 254 sq ft, (measured) with reclaimed redwood flooring from an 1880’s Navy warehouse. Outside, the backyard oasis beckons with vibrant plants, trees and a spacious deck for outdoor gatherings. Great storage, countless upgrades! Amazing neighborhood; parks, amenities and eateries minutes away: Redwood and Dimond Parks, Bombera, Grand Lake Kitchen, La Farine Bakery & Peet’s Coffee. This home offers the perfect blend of unique design and craftsmanship, comfort, and community.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Scott Ward - Agt: 415-225-4593 - Elegance, refined style, architectural details and superb natural light converge to make this property simply sensational. This Upper Dimond district Spanish Mediterranean home has 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms and office. Plus there is a fully detached 1 bed, 1 bath potential income generating ADU. The main house LR has a vaulted ceiling and is surrounded by windows, a similar light-filled experience is found in the dining room. An office looks out on the yard.  The updated kitchen (2019) is the true heartbeat of the home it possesses warmth, refinement and an attention to practical details. The colorful floor tile, custom cabinets, and countertops reflect design cohesion and an aesthetic. Direct access to the outside from the kitchen. The primary bedroom has two closets and a handsome ensuite bath with walk-in shower. Split level staircase leads up to three other bedrooms and an updated bathroom (2024) with tub. Outside the home is a cleverly designed outdoor space - a true oasis with native plantings and lots of room for outdoor dining, and a cozy seating area. Through the redwood gate is a lawn. The ADU at 2625 Madeline is a great place to be. Wood floors throughout and lovely natural light. Living room, eat in kitchen, full bath and separate bedroom + laundry room. 2 car garage.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Wei-Pei Cherng - Off: 415-364-8559 - Rare modern farmhouse on a private spacious lot in the desirable Lincoln Highlands neighborhood! Move-in ready, this newly remodeled 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom house features new bathrooms, kitchen, roof, heat-pump HVAC system, seismically reinforced foundation, 200 AMP electrical panel, hardwood flooring, and dual paned windows. A peaceful breakfast nook and exposed family room ceiling beams complete the farmhouse design. Newly landscaped, drought-resistant front yard offers countless entertaining options and flexible car parking for both owner and guests. Two detached bonus spaces allow for a private meditation space, office, workshop or potential ADU - the possibilities are endless. Walking distance to highly-rated schools and conveniently located near highways, nature trails, parks, downtown Dimond District, and shopping.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Welcome to the Urban Orchard in Upper Dimond, a large, updated home with a flexible floor plan and plenty of room to grow, just blocks to the heart of Laurel Village. This refreshed 5 bedroom, 2 bathroom single family home features a fully renovated kitchen, gorgeous refinished hardwood floors in the living spaces and new carpeting in the bedrooms. 3BDs/1BA upstairs along with a formal entryway, large living room w/a huge picture window, a formal dining room with original built-ins, and a charming, bright breakfast room. The kitchen offers all new cabinetry, new gas range, dishwasher and fridge, new countertops and luxury vinyl floors. Downstairs is a generous space complete with expansive family room, two bedrooms, a 2nd bathroom, kitchenette, laundry and storage room all with a separate entrance. Adjacent to the house is a mature orchard offering mandarin oranges, lemons, limes and much more. Two sheds offer loads of options plus a one car garage and a view patio round off this exceptional property.
Confidential Remarks: Offers as they come. Disclosures here: https://app.disclosures.io/link/3070-MacArthur-Boulevard-1totywgb. Escrow opened with Amy Edberg, First American. Please try to keep it there as she has done a lot of title work for the trust. Floor plan measured 2,190; tax records reflect 1,204. Property was moved when I580 was built and placed on top of the lower level - sellers believe this is where the sqft discrepancy originated but are unable to verify. Lower level kitchenette may not be warranted.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Sarah E Marcus - 510-915-6705 - Discover vintage charm and modern sophistication in this renovated front porch bungalow on a quiet Upper Dimond cul-de-sac. The owners have meticulously updated the kitchen, primary bedroom, bathroom, garage, backyard, and deck. Step inside to a sunlit living room that flows into an inviting dining area and an updated kitchen, perfect for entertaining or cozy evenings in. Stay cool with central AC and enjoy recent updates including solar panels, upgraded electrical systems, and a state-of-the-art HVAC system. The home features two spacious bedrooms, with the master opening to a sprawling deck—ideal for morning coffee or evening relaxation. The garage conversion offers a flex area with a kitchenette and bathroom, perfect for guests, creative projects, or a home office. The backyard is a serene retreat with a mature garden, stunning magnolia tree, and a deck that spans the rear of the home—perfect for BBQs and outdoor fun. Enjoy walkability to restaurants, grocery stores, parks, schools, and daycare. Boasting a 91 Walk Score®, you’re a short stroll from local gems like Grand Lake Kitchen, Bombera, and La Farine. Embrace timeless charm and modern convenience in this Upper Dimond bungalow. Come see for yourself and get ready to experience the ultimate in Oakland living.
Directions to Property: Rhoda Ave, L. MacArthur Blvd, R. Boston Ave

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Darrell Hoh - Agt: 510-295-3541 - Welcome to this gorgeous home that stands out from the crowd – where colors dance and personality meets comfortable living. This masterpiece is more than just walls and a roof; it is a canvas bursting with vibrant hues and abundant character.Step inside and relish its well-designed two-bedroom, two-bathroom floor plan, in this meticulously maintained 1926 artist’s retreat. Oak hardwood floors flow throughout the main house, guiding your footsteps through a space that exudes warmth and charm.But, wait… This exceptional property also includes not one but TWO ADDITIONAL UNITS: a cottage and a “tiny home”. The charming cottage boasts one bedroom, two closets, a full kitchen, bathroom with tub, and its own fenced yard. Guest retreat? Artist's studio? You decide. The tiny home is colorfully decorated in aboriginal fabrics and was previously used as a very popular and successful Airbnb. It has an ample fridge, cozy sleeping loft, and shares a bathroom with the main house. You can continue this venture and enjoy possible income or keep it as your own cozy creative spot.The mature landscaping that surrounds the property adds to the allure of this enchanting residence, with winter-blooming magnolia and Angel’s trumpet wafting perfume into the evening air. Enjoy the magical garden!
Confidential Remarks: Pre-sale escrow with Old Republic Title, Berkeley, Lori Endo, #1112038452-LE. Cottage and converted shed were rentals, not done with permits. Buyer to check with Oakland rent control laws. Sewer lateral compliance certificate. Ceramic hands in bathroom and curtains/rods do not convey.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Regina Jacobs - 510-693-7973 - New Listing. Exceptional Bungalow located in the heart of the vibrant Laurel neighborhood. This charming bungalow has been thoughtfully updated, offers an all level floor plan and abounds with architectural details. The living room begins with a built-in bookcase, corner windows and welcoming hearth. The living room flows seamlessly into the cozy formal dining room. Adjoined is an updated kitchen with stainless appliances to support the chef’s culinary dreams. A convenient laundry room is tucked away on the other side of the kitchen. The connecting mud room creates a functional entry from the side door. There are two spacious and private bedrooms each with views the beautiful verdant backyard. The hall bathroom is ideally located between the common living space and the bedrooms. Wainscoting in the bathroom gives it a vintage vibe. The backyard is an urban oasis offering multiple experiences including a patio for entertaining, level lawn area for play and a large vegetable bed to bring farm to table to your dining experience. Just minutes to shops, restaurants, parks, and transportation. Open Sunday 2-4pm.
Confidential Remarks: GOLDEN OPPORTUNITY!! This charming home is still available. Open Sun, Mar. 17th from 2-4PM. Square footage of home and lot size advertised in the MLS will not be verified or guaranteed by Sellers or Listing Agent. Please visit 4024maple.com for more photos and information. OFFERS AS WRITTEN. CALL Regina at (510) 693-7973 with any questions.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: David Gunderman - 510-205-4369 - A jewel box in Dimond District awaits in this charming 2+BR/1BA Craftsman bungalow. Surrounded by mature landscaping, ascend the front steps to the welcoming porch of this 1129 SQFT home (including vaulted artist/work studio crafted from the detached garage). Light streams into the living room from a large picture window with an Arts & Crafts design, while the fireplace is flanked with built-in shelving and cabinets. Gorgeous hardwood floors span the home into the kitchen with built-in glass cabinets and separate dining area. A laundry room is off the kitchen as well. The 2 sunny bedrooms have roomy closets and share an updated full bathroom. Out the backdoor, the spacious raised brick patio area is an oasis to entertain your friends or drink a peaceful morning coffee. With a sliding glass door to the patio and multiple windows, the home’s refurbished garage is ready for use as an office, artist’s studio, or potential renovation to an income generating unit? A dedicated parking space is off the shared courtyard and a side yard provides a private, canopied outdoor space for enjoyment. Enjoy the best of Dimond District’s shops, dining, tennis and basketball courts, swimming pool, playgrounds, and trails for running or walking the dog along Sausal Creek. This home truly is a gem!
Confidential Remarks: Seller open to doing sewer lateral during escrow, if desired. Bed/Bath/Square Feet may not match public records - buyer to verify/satisfy. The taking of images of this property is limited to those persons preparing Appraisal or Inspection reports.    Matterport and website: https://thegundermangroup.com/property/2720-madeline-street-oakland/.

Remarks: Diana Fong - 510-828-3832 - Beautifully remodeled Craftsman Bungalow in lower Laurel District, This lovely home features an inviting layout, updated kitchen with Quartz countertop, stainless steel appliances, breakfast bar, and spacious nook; a cozy living room with large, beautiful bay windows, built-in cabinetry, gorgeous crystal light chandelier and wood-burning fireplace.  Additionally, it has a tastefully updated bathroom with stylish design and fixtures, generous-sized bedrooms, an enclosed long driveway with plenty of parking, a detached finished garage ideal as possible ADU, in-law, home office or gym.  It also boasts a new roof, central heat with Google nest thermostat, refinished hardwood floors, dual pane windows, recessed lighting, sewer lateral in compliance, spacious private backyard with endless possibilities.
